plot: A TV show about 4 fairies: Kururu, Chiriri, Sarara and Hororo. They have come to the human world in small bottles. They wish to become human. A young man, Sensei-san, teaches them about the human world.
plot_en: A TV show about 4 fairies: Kururu, Chiriri, Sarara and Hororo. They have come to the human world in small bottles. They wish to become human. A young man, Sensei-san, teaches them about the human world.
plot_es: A TV show about 4 fairies: Kururu, Chiriri, Sarara and Hororo. They have come to the human world in small bottles. They wish to become human. A young man, Sensei-san, teaches them about the human world.
title: Binzume Yôsei
